name: CrysPaledramon
effect: [When Digivolving] Trash the bottom digivolution card of all of your opponent's Digimon.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn] If your opponent has a Digimon with no digivolution cards in play, this Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
